thread.title: Baby born with two heads on one body baffles medics and stunned relatives
thread.title_full: Baby born with two heads on one body baffles medics and stunned relatives

author: Kara O'Neill
title: Baby born with two heads on one body baffles medics and stunned relatives
text:
News Baby born with two heads on one body baffles medics and stunned relatives The footage of the newborn baby was posted on social media by family members who could not believe what they had seen Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Baby born with two heads Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Footage has emerged online showing a baby born with two heads. 
State officials have confirmed the bizarre birth after a video was widely shared on social media. 
The clip is claimed to have been posted on the internet by baffled relatives who couldn't believe what they had seen. 
Footage shows the newborns wailing just after being born, as they are being held by medics , with tubes leading into their noses. Read More British 'people smuggler' ditches 19 asylum seekers in freezing conditions The baby boy has been born with two heads (Photo: CEN) 
Authorities have refused to go into detail about the rare case, only confirming that the mother, who has not been identified, is "stable" with the Siamese twins being kept in hospital for observation. 
Doctors are said to be looking at a "plan going forward" for the babies. 
The rare case happened recently in the city of Ciudad Juarez, in the north-central Mexican state of Chihuahua. Read More Mother only discovers her one baby was actually conjoined twins after giving birth Doctors are still deciding on a plan 'going forward' for the babies (Photo: CEN) 
The video was posted online on 6th January and shows the baby wearing a nappy and being held by a medic. 
It is reported the baby is male but it is not known if the case was picked up on scans or if the parents knew beforehand that they were having Siamese twins. Read More
